text:
1/ Emotional Connection

Emosional brand yg kuat bikin konsumennya merasa nyaman ketika pake brand tsb. Ini terbukti Starbucks ngutamain experience & jarang punya masalah sama konsumennya.

Hal-hal detil kayak order name, sampe kondisi in store selalu diperhatiin sama mereka.
text_english:
1/ Emotional Connection

Emotional brand that is strong makes consumers feel comfortable when using the brand. This is proven to be Starbucks Ngutamain Experience & amp; Rarely have problems with consumers.

Detailed things like order names, until the conditions in store are always considered by them.

text:
2/ Beli merchandise = loyalty

Merchandise jadi keunggulan buat maksimalin loyalty mereka selain member card. Ketika konsumen punya merchandise nya, jadi remark kalau mereka "pernah" beli starbucks.

Dengan begini bikin mereka konsisten punya brand exclusive yg bagus. https://t.co/wZ04JuMnnI
text_english:
2/ buy merchandise = loyalty

Merchandise is an advantage for their maximum loyalty besides members of the member card. When consumers have their merchandise, so they are remarking if they "have" bought Starbucks.

This way makes them consistently have a good exclusive brand. https://t.co/wz04jumnni

text:
3/ Inovasi marketing

Meskipun normal price nya tergolong mahal, tapi Starbucks tetep cari cara gimana memikat konsumennya di segmen menengah.

Mereka sering ngasih diskon/harga yg menarik biar middle segment bisa tetep mampu beli produk mereka.
text_english:
3/ Marketing Innovation

Although the normal price is quite expensive, but Starbucks is still looking for ways to attract consumers in the middle segment.

They often give discounts/attractive prices so that middle segments can still be able to buy their products.

text:
4/ Remarkable brand

Konsistensi bikin mereka punya remarkable brand yg bagus. Logo, product, service hingga price tetep dipertahanin agar brand identity melekat di benak konsumennya.

Ini terbukti sukses karena Starbucks tetep jadi top brand sampe skrng & salesnya terus naik.
text_english:
4/ Remarkable brand

Consistency makes them have a good brand remarkable brand. Logo, product, service to price is still being held so that the brand identity is attached to the minds of its consumers.

This proved successful because Starbucks still became the top brand until now & amp; The sales continued to rise.

text: Lo primero que hizo Starbucks fue crear una marca aspiracional. El café de Starbucks es un símbolo, no solo una bebida. No compras café, compras status.

text:
Starbucks también ha dominado la conveniencia. 

Tienen sus cafeterías donde más las necesitamos: cerca de oficinas, universidades y estaciones. Eso, en un mundo acelerado como el de hoy, tiene un precio, y es un precio que estamos dispuestos a pagar.
text_english:
Starbucks has also dominated convenience. 

They have their coffee shops where we need them most: near offices, universities and stations. That, in an accelerated world like today, has a price, and is a price that we are willing to pay.
